casebody.data:
STATE
v.
Scott David ALLEN. No. 115A04. Supreme Court of North Carolina. March 3, 2005. William N. Farrell, Special Deputy Attorney General, Robert C. Montgomery, Assistant Attorney General, Garland N. Yates, District Attorney, for State.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 3rd day of March 2005 by Defendant for Extension of Time to File Brief:

"Motion for Extension is Allowed. Defendant (Scott David Allen) shall have up to and including the 8th day of April 2005 to file and serve his/her brief with this Court. By order of the Court in conference this the 3rd day of March 2005."
